mapper.select: select telecom_num, phone_model_num, phone_name, phone_content, phone_price, phone_image from phones
select telecom_num, phone_model_num, phone_name, phone_content, phone_price, phone_image from phones where telecom_num = #{telecom_num}
select telecom_num, phone_model_num, phone_name, phone_content, phone_price, phone_image from phones where phone_model_num = #{phone_model_num}
mapper.insert: insert into phones(telecom_num, phone_model_num, phone_name, phone_content, phone_price, phone_image) values(#{telecom_num},#{phone_model_num},#{phone_name},#{phone_content},#{phone_price},#{phone_image})
